name: BSO
comment:
>>44508389

“Still thinking about the merger? How do you feel about it?” You ask.

“I've already told you how I feel, Ashe.” She responds. “At this point, though, it’s a necessary evil. I don’t want to just accept Liza’s edict as absolute truth, but it’s hard for us to put our trust into people—barring those who’ve already proven themselves trustworthy.”

“The Alliance members?” You ask.

“The ones we don’t have a choice but to work with. I'm not sure what she means in regards to discussing our 'foreign policy', but I think it's at least worth hearing.” She responds, closing the doors behind you as the two of you exit the Communications Hub. She gives you a wave, heading for the staircase. “Alright, I’ve got to get out of here.”

“Yeah,” You say. “Thanks. I should get on some things myself.”

> Head to one of the Observatory’s facilities. (Write-in)
> Search for some kind of information on the message boards. (Write-in)
> Log out.
> Write-in.
